ud5.1:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
ud5.1:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikāya deviyā saddhiṃ uparipāsādavaragato hoti.
ud5.1:1.4: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavoca:
ud5.1:1.5: “atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocañño attanā piyataro”ti?
ud5.1:2.1: “Natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā piyataro.
ud5.1:2.2: Tuyhaṃ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti?
ud5.1:2.3: “Mayhampi kho, mallike, natthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti.
ud5.1:3.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo pāsādā orohitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
ud5.1:3.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud5.1:4.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, mallikāya deviyā saddhiṃ uparipāsādavaragato mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavocaṃ:
ud5.1:4.2: ‘atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocañño attanā piyataro’ti?
ud5.1:4.3: Evaṃ vutte, mallikā devī maṃ etadavoca:
ud5.1:4.4: ‘natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā piyataro.
ud5.1:4.5: Tuyhaṃ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro’ti?
ud5.1:4.6: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavocaṃ:
ud5.1:4.7: ‘mayhampi kho, mallike, natthañño koci attanā piyataro’”ti.
ud5.1:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
